title: A new ballroom in the White House? Trump says he'd like that.
shortDescription: In 2016, before he took office the first time, Trump offered to spend $100 million for a new White House ballroom. He never got approval.

title: Panic across federal workforce as Trump's resignation deadline looms
shortDescription: Federal workers say they're in a mode of fear, shock and uncertainty as they decide whether to accept President Trump's buyout offer.

title: Trump signs order banning trans women from sports teams
shortDescription: President Trump signed an executive order barring transgender women and girls from playing on school sports teams.

title: House GOP panel kills Democrats' call to subpoena Elon Musk over DOGE
shortDescription: The heated exchange early in a House Oversight hearing about "Rightsizing Government' leads to Democrat protests that Musk is operating with impunity

title: Trump signs order targeting transgender women's sports
shortDescription: Federal officials could withhold funding from schools that allow transgender women and girls to play women's sports.

title: White House calls Gaza plan 'out of the box'
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt addressed President Trump's controversial plan to own Gaza, calling it an "out-of-the-box idea."

title: Former first lady and Eagles fan Jill Biden to attend Super Bowl
shortDescription: Former first lady Jill Biden headed to New Orleans to watch Super Bowl

title: Mitch McConnell falls twice, leaves Senate in wheelchair
shortDescription: A spokesperson for the former Senate leader said he was fine and the "lingering effects of polio" won't disrupt his work.

title: Elon Musk post doctored to add threat to Trump critics | Fact check
shortDescription: The image of the X post is a fabrication. There is no record of the post on Musk's profile and no credible evidence it was ever shared.

title: Trump wants to make Gaza the Riviera, but what's it like on the ground?
shortDescription: Little infrastructure in Gaza is still standing. Here's how the territory has evolved under Israeli control.

title: Trump's early plans to reshape the government, remake the world
shortDescription: Forget the first 100 days. In the first 17, Trump has moved with a velocity faster than any modern president. Here are five lessons learned.

title: Trump's promised immigration raids hit Denver, Aurora, Colo.
shortDescription: Federal agents searched for reported Venezuelan gang members in Denver and nearby Aurora early Wednesday.

title: Speaker Johnson says Trump's Gaza plan is 'bold'
shortDescription: Speaker Mike Johnson expresses support for President Donald Trump's idea for the U.S. to take over Gaza.

title: Second US judge blocks Trump's birthright citizenship order
shortDescription: The judge, an appointee of Trump's Democratic predecessor Joe Biden, issued a nationwide preliminary injunction blocking Trump's order.

title: House speaker claims Trump is acting within scope
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson told reporters that President Trump's recent actions are "not a usurpation of authority in any way."

title: Trump to federal employees: buyout or possible furlough
shortDescription: The Trump administration warned federal employees that they could be furloughed if they don't accept a buyout offer.
